# destinationAudioUnit

**Instance Property**

The audio unit that receives the track’s events.

## Declaration

```swift
var destinationAudioUnit: AVAudioUnit? { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property and a [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVMusicTrack/destinationMIDIEndpoint] are mutually exclusive. You must attach the audio to an audio engine to receive events. The track must be part of the [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSequencer] you associate with the same engine. When playing, the track sends it’s events to that [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioUnit]. You can’t change the destination audio unit while the track’s sequence is in a playing state.

## Configuring the Track Destinations

- **destinationMIDIEndpoint**: The MIDI endpoint you specify as the track’s target.
